title: Blueprint, "Harold S. Anderson House: Desk", February 23, 1937
markings: Stamp in red ink on verso, lower left: MAR 4 1937/COMPANY OF/MASTER CRAFTSMAN, INC.; stamp at center: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in stamp, center: 8608/F.S./ANDERSON, OLSSON/P.S./D./2/23/37, 3/3/37, 1, MASTERCR.; inscribed below stamp: TWO DESKS: 45" LONG x 25" WIDE 30" HIGH/ONE IN POLLARDD OAK - INSIDE OAK/ONE IN EAST INDIAN ROSEWOOD - INSIDE MAHOGANY/FINISH ALL AROUND/ALL EXPOSED EDGES VENEERED ALSO TOP EDGES OF DRAWERS/FOUR DRAWERS ON CENTRE DRAWER GUIDES/USE CENTRE LOCKING DEVICE /USE DOMES OF SILENCE/PULLS SAME WOOD AS REST OF DESK/PROVIDE STOPPERS FOR ALL DRAWERS; inscribed in red color pencil on verso, lower left: 8608 Desk
description: Perspective, plan, elevations for desk. Rounded right corner of desk, squared left and back sides. Open shelf below surface at right; drawer at center. Three stacked drawers at left with vertical pulls. Leg at right. One desk in pollard oak, another in East Indian rosewood.
